attributes.action: Stop animal testing on dogs/ no breeding of dogs for medical testing
attributes.additional_details: Why do we have to do medical testing on dogs? Or even consider breeding dogs for this purpose. In this day and age there are other methods that could be used rather than testing on dogs. Please put a tsI have just watched on sky news that the government are considering breeding dogs for testing,the news piece showed a farm in east Yorkshire testing on beagles,disgusting!!! The government promised to reduce this,put a stop to it!!!
